de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.visunproj

Class KeyVisualization

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.AbstractVisFactory
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.visunproj.KeyVisualization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisualizationProcessor, VisFactory

    public class KeyVisualization
extends AbstractVisFactory
    Visualizer, displaying the key for a clustering. TODO: re-add automatic sizing depending on the number of clusters. TODO: also show in scatter plot detail view.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
